sentences.sContent: This is a sublanguage allowing navigation to nodes, retrieval of sets of nodes, and so forth.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a sublanguage allowing navigation to nodes, retrieval of sets of nodes, and so forth.
sentences.sCn: 这是一种用于遍历节点、检索节点组等的子语言。

sentences.sContent: After you have made the appropriate changes, the brackets next to the resource will say "Unknown Language" and show the language and sublanguage identifiers.
sentences.sContent_eng: After you have made the appropriate changes, the brackets next to the resource will say "Unknown Language" and show the language and sublanguage identifiers.
sentences.sCn: 进行适当更改之后，资源旁边的括号将显示“未知语言”，并显示语言和子语言标识符。

remMethod.val: sub(次； 下级) + language(语言) → 子语言

trans.tranCn: [计] 子语言，次语言（指社会中某一集团或阶层专用的言语）
